enhanced_by.reason: The word() method relies on the compassPoint field being set. Calling compassPoint(CompassPoint) ensures the field is properly initialized before invoking word().
Both word() and abbreviation() methods return strings related to compass directions. Assertions for word() can be informed by the behavior and output of abbreviation().
Both word() and azimuth() methods return strings related to compass directions. Assertions for word() can be informed by the behavior and output of azimuth().
